content: Would it be possible to add custom metadata at the dataset level? Currently, adding custom metadata to a collection applies to all datasets within it.
No, but you are welcome to open an issue about this.
Okay. What about at the file level? Is it possible to add custom metadata to a file?
Is there an API that returns all the metadata fields (both mandatory and optional) of a collection? Currently, http://localhost:8080/api/dataverses/2/datasetSchema API returns only the required ones.
Well, does https://demo.dataverse.org/api/metadatablocks and https://demo.dataverse.org/api/metadatablocks/citation help? They should work on localhost too.
Thanks. It's exactly what I was looking for.
Febin Sebastian E has marked this topic as resolved.
